txt.en:
'It is comforting to know that they are not on our doorstep today, but I still fear for what the future holds.

'You have done me a great service, [placeholder], as simple as it may have been.

'Wait... what is that?'
Talk to Mildir
Mildir can be found in Ost Lontir in central Belfalas.\n\nYou have searched outside Ost Lontir and found little evidence of an impending Corsair attack.
DNT -- will not be seen

The haystack can be found behind Mildir in Ost Lontir in central Belfalas.\n\nYou have reported to Mildir, but now have heard a suspicious noise coming from a nearby haystack. You should investigate the haystack.
Behind Mildir, you suddenly hear a haystack sneeze
Mildir can be found in Ost Lontir in central Belfalas.\n\nYou have found a small child in the haystack, much to Mildir's obvious dismay. You should talk to Mildir.
Suddenly, a small, laughing child leaps out of the haystack and runs away
Examine the haystack
'Confound that child! If he were a Corsair I would have... Bah!\n\n'You have done enough for me, [placeholder]. If children are to be the worst of my problems, I shall count myself lucky!'
Talk to Mildir
You do not see anything unusual here...
Aside from a view into the bay, nothing catches your eye...
Mildir laments the grim future that might await the people of Ost Lontir and grows increasingly paranoid that the town will fall in the coming days.
Search the overlook to the west of Ost Lontir

'I do not think we are safe here, [placeholder]. Corsairs have been spreading through our lands like a great blight.

'Maybe the guards think it is amusing to have a drunk Corsair right outside our walls, but I do not! They are planning something for Ost Lontir, I just know it.

'If you could search the overlooks to the east and west of town for any sign of the Corsairs, I would be grateful... and maybe I could actually sleep tonight.'
Search the overlook to the east of Ost Lontir
DNT -- will not be seen
Too Far From Safety
Ost Lontir can be found in central Belfalas.\n\nMildir has asked you to search outside for signs of Corsairs approaching Ost Lontir.
